paragraphs.content: The Receiving Party intends to {{ purpose }} (the "**Permitted Purpose**").

In connection with the Permitted Purpose, the Disclosing Party has disclosed or made available, and may further disclose or make available, certain confidential and/or proprietary technical or business information to Receiving Party that the Disclosing Party desires the Receiving Party to treat as confidential.
This non-disclosure agreement (the "**Agreement**") sets out the covenants and conditions under which such information is provided.
